No prior chemotherapy ( except part pre postoperative therapy , complete > 1 year prior start date protocol ) . Patients receive prior pelvic radiation therapy ineligible . Other prior radiation therapy , however , permit , provide least 4 week elapse since completion therapy initiation protocol . No myocardial infarction past six month . No major surgery past three week . No uncontrolled serious medical psychiatric illness . No uncontrolled diarrhea . Patients peripheral neuropathy > grade 1 exclude . Women childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test . Men woman childbearing potential must use adequate contraception . No clinically apparent central nervous system metastases carcinomatous meningitis . No active malignancy nonmelanoma skin cancer insitu cervical carcinoma .
